author: cbs8
title: Cormant-CS 8 DCIM Set for Imminent European Launch at 4 Critical IT Event in Holland
text:
Cormant, the data center infrastructure management software leader, and 4 Critical IT, the critical business IT experts, collaborate to reveal Cormant-CS 8 during an all-day launch conference with live demos on October 22, 2015.
San Luis Obispo, CA., USA
Cormant, Inc., a global data center infrastructure management (DCIM) pure-play expert, today announced its official European launch of Cormant-CS version 8 with its Holland partners, 4 Critical IT. Event attendees will partake in a launch conference to learn how Cormant-CS DCIM can provide business security and efficiencies. The event will also include live demonstrations of version 8 with interactive opportunities to uncover a “faulty” server for a chance to win a prize.
The October 22, 2015 event will be the second Dutch event for Cormant and 4 Critical IT this year. Organizations from the financial, insurance, and governmental industries will be represented at the event, among others. All represented organizations are interested in solving the most important data center challenges.
“Cormant-CS DCIM solves the real data center challenges that managers face daily,” said Henri Bosman, 4 Critical IT CEO. “IT problems are now considered business problems and version 8 introduces new features, including alerting features, to close the business-IT gap.”
Cormant-CS 8 makes it easier than ever to view the information that is most important to each respective user. With configurable dashboards, alert subscriptions, and a brand new infrastructure console with the ability to bookmark sites for aggregated data feeds, managers can view information quickly with the ability to make proactive decisions.
For attendance details to the esteemed European launch of Cormant-CS 8, contact Henri Bosman at sales(at)4criticalit(dot)nl.
About Cormant, Inc.
Cormant has been an expert at IT infrastructure management and DCIM software for the data center and beyond since 2001. Boasting a 94% customer retention rate, Cormant’s solutions are sold globally with customers and partners on six continents encompassing all industries. Cormant is focused on working with customers to improve their management, control and reporting processes by delivering Cormant-CS, a DCIM solution that provides a single-pane-of-glass view to where the physical and logical layers of IT infrastructure meet. Learn more at http://www.cormant.com and connect with us on LinkedIn.
About 4 Critical IT bv
4 Critical IT helps businesses gain control of their business-critical IT infrastructure from carefully selected solutions to expert consulting. 4 Critical IT facilitates the IT needs of businesses utilizing its 10 years of IT experience in complex corporate IT environments. Learn more at http://4criticalit.nl/
